messages.subject: Re: Booklist
messages.msgSnippet: ... I will do so. Sorry we got cut off last night.. AIM logged me off and I couldn t logon anymore. ~wounds
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> I uploaded a general booklist in the "FILES" section...the books may
> be added to the database (http://www.shinsengumidb.com) under the
> keywords used in the "subjects" line
>
> I will add more books which I used to better understand swords and
> journal articles I am using for my Tokyo Metropolitan Police
> Department and SEinan War report when I get a chance.
>
> Your Loyal Retainer
> Secretarytocapt3


I will do so. Sorry we got cut off last night.. AIM logged me off and
I couldn't logon anymore.

~wounds

messages.messageBody:
I uploaded a general booklist in the "FILES" section...the books may
be added to the database (http://www.shinsengumidb.com) under the
keywords used in the "subjects" line

I will add more books which I used to better understand swords and
journal articles I am using for my Tokyo Metropolitan Police
Department and SEinan War report when I get a chance.

Your Loyal Retainer
Secretarytocapt3
